markdownRemark.html:
Problem statement

Having list of data frames with the same column names we would like to flatten (bind) them into a single data frame.

Tip: do.call

do.call function can be used to invoke function f passing parameters contained in a list. The final call looks like this do.call("f", list).

Solution

f    == "rbind"
list == our list of data frames
q.e.d

Code

means <- sapply(df, mean)
df_list <- lapply(df, 1, function(x) x - means)

do.call("rbind", df_list)

BE AWARE
